akn:section.akn:heading: Conditions for maintaining escrow and indemnity deposit accounts.

akn:content.akn:p: A title insurer may operate as an escrow, indemnity, settlement, or closing agent, if:
Funds held in an escrow account shall be disbursed only pursuant to a written instruction or agreement specifying how and to whom the funds may be disbursed.
Funds held in an indemnity deposit account shall be disbursed only pursuant to a written agreement specifying:

Any interest received on funds deposited in connection with any escrow, settlement, indemnity deposit, or closing shall be paid, net of administrative costs, to the depositing party, unless the depositorâ€™s instructions for the funds or a governing law provides otherwise.

The Commissioner may prescribe a standard agreement for escrow, settlement, closing, or indemnity deposit funds.
